DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to compare visual degradation in a stressed (forced stare) environment in patients before and after acute administration of Systane Ultra.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate the Ability of Systane Ultra to Improve Subjective Symptoms of Ocular Irritation Post 60 Min. Athletic Performance.
DOC.criteria: Player/ Coach must answer "Yes" to the survey eligibility question. Player/Coach must voluntarily agree to participate in survey
